abstract: Venezuela announces plans to ease currency controls that critics say are feeding nation's economic woes.
lead_paragraph: The move is an easing of the system of tightly controlled exchange rates that critics say have fed the nation’s economic crisis.

headline.main: Venezuela Announces Plan to Relax Currency Controls
headline.print_headline: Venezuela Announces Plan to Relax Currency Controls

snippet: The move is an easing of the system of tightly controlled exchange rates that critics say have fed the nation’s economic crisis.
